entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
